main event: A witness reported observing multiple ring-shaped UFOs in the sky above Amarillo, Texas on 12 August 1952.
interesting points: The witness described the objects as ascending and descending in a small area., One object left rapidly, leaving a black streak., The objects appeared to be ring-shaped and were seen to disappear behind clouds., The witness claimed the objects would disappear and then reappear., A follow-up investigation had insufficient data for evaluation.
